substations.name: Substation 1A
substations.description: Panipat Thermal Power Station I is located at Khukhrana Panipat in Haryana. The power plant is one of the coal based power plants of HPGCL

substations.name: Substation 1B
substations.description: This substation is part of Panipat Thermal Power Station I and is responsible for distributing electricity to the surrounding area.

substations.name: Substation 1C
substations.description: This substation is another key component of Panipat Thermal Power Station I, ensuring reliable electricity distribution.

substations.name: Substation 1D
substations.description: Substation 1C plays a crucial role in transmitting electricity from Panipat Thermal Power Station I to the grid.

substations.name: Substation 1E
substations.description: Substation 1D is responsible for ensuring stable voltage supply to the local community from Panipat Thermal Power Station I.

substations.name: Substation 1F
substations.description: Substation 1E acts as a vital link between Panipat Thermal Power Station I and the distribution network.

substations.name: Substation 1G
substations.description: Substation 1F helps manage the flow of electricity from Panipat Thermal Power Station I to the grid effectively.

substations.name: Substation 1H
substations.description: Substation 1G plays a key role in maintaining the reliability and stability of the electricity supply from Panipat Thermal Power Station I.

substations.name: Substation 1I
substations.description: Substation 1H is responsible for transforming and distributing electricity from Panipat Thermal Power Station I to end-users.

substations.name: Substation 1J
substations.description: Substation 1I ensures that the electricity generated by Panipat Thermal Power Station I is efficiently distributed to consumers.

substations.name: Substation 2A

substations.name: Substation 2D
substations.description: Substation A4 helps manage the flow of electricity from Solar Power Station A to the grid efficiently.

substations.name: Substation 2E
substations.description: Substation A5 is a critical component of Solar Power Station A's electrical infrastructure, ensuring reliable power distribution.
